title: Caravanserai Desert Dinner With Optional Transfers
description:
Take a step back in time and explore an ancient culture with a modern twist accompanied with dining experience.

What to Expect

The adventure begins when your guide picks you up from your hotel in Dubai to caravanserai desert camp for a buffet style dining experience. Embark on a traditional buffet dinner, followed by authentic Bedouin live performances. Find all you need, to immerse yourself in the ultimate Arabian experience.

Highlights
  • Caravanserai camp: Take a journey with us and step into a world of traditional style with a touch of luxury and authentic camp experience.
  • 5-star Arabian (inspired buffet): Indulge in an array of dishes that represents the finest Arabian cuisine, carefully curated to delight your senses.
  • Live shows: Immerse yourself in the captivating Arabian culture with live performances.
What's Included in the ticket
  • Pick up and drop off service
  • Camel riding
  • Henna painting
  • Belly dance, fire dance and more
  • Fire show
  • Air-conditioned 4x4 vehicle
  • Live Barbecue
  • International 5-star buffet
  • Water and soft drinks
What's not Included in the ticket
  • Anything not mentioned in Inculsions
  • Dune bashing
Timing's
  • Tour timing's: 06:00 p.m. to 09:00 p.m.
  • Tour Operates on daily basis
  • Pick up will be in between 05:00 p.m. to 05:30 p.m.
Commence your journey as your guide collects you from your Dubai hotel, heading to the Caravanserai Desert Camp by Tour Dubai for a buffet-style dining escapade. Indulge in a traditional buffet dinner and relish authentic Bedouin live performances. Everything you require for the quintessential Arabian experience awaits at the Caravanserai Luxury Camp in Dubai.

title: Discover Scuba Dive at Fujairah
description:
Discover the marine world under the sea and learn the basics of scuba diving at Fujairah.


What To Expect

 Explore the colorful corals and tropical marine life of Fujairah and learn how to dive with the help of certified instructors in this beginner-level scuba diving lesson. 



  Highlights

- A perfect opportunity to try scuba diving and explore the underwater world with no prior experience required.
- Explore the Fujairah coast and try scuba diving with no commitment to a longer program.
- Learn the basics of scuba diving with the help of certified diving instructors.
- Discover the Arabian waters with one of the best scuba diving Fujairah experiences. 



What’s included in the ticket

 - One 2-3 Hour Scuba Diving Session with Certified Instructors.
- Scuba Diving Suit and Equipment.
- Unlimited Soft Drinks and Water.



Timing: 

 8:30 a.m, 1:30 p.m.  



Ticket Information: 


- Discover Scuba Dive at Fujairah ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable.
- Visitors are not allowed to bring food or beverages, glassware, or alcohol into the premises.
- Please carry a valid photo ID with you.
- Book online in advance to redeem the best deals and offers.


Important things to know before your visit

 - Discover Scuba Dive at the Fujairah Dress Code: Comfortable swimming attire and footwear are required.
- Discover Scuba Dive at Fujairah

Age and Health Restrictions:
- Participants must be 10 years or older.
- Participants must be fit to dive.
- Participants must pass a dive medical questionnaire.
- Please bring a towel and a change of clothes.
- Transportation pick up and drop off from Dubai to Fujairah is available

Address: Nemo Diving Center Dubai, Fujairah, UAE

 By car: Nemo Diving Center is located in Fujairah, which is easily accessible by car. You can park the car in the designated parking for a small fee.

title: Gravity Indoor Skydiving
description:
Immerse yourself in the exhilarating world of indoor skydiving at "Gravity Indoor Skydiving," located in the heart of Manama. This state-of-the-art attraction offers a thrilling experience where you can feel the sensation of freefalling and learn the art of human body flight in one of the world's largest indoor wind tunnels. With expert instructors, top-of-the-line equipment, and a focus on safety, "Gravity Indoor Skydiving" provides a unique and unforgettable adventure for individuals of all skill levels.

Highlights
  • Feel the rush of wind as you float effortlessly in the massive indoor wind tunnel, replicating the sensation of a real skydive without the need for an airplane.
  • Receive guidance from experienced instructors who will teach you the techniques of body flight. Learn how to maneuver your body, maintain stability, and perform exhilarating tricks as you soar through the air.
  • Capture your moments of soaring through the air on camera to share with friends and family
What’s included in the ticket
Access to Gravity Indoor Skydiving.    

Timing: 
  • From Tuesday to Saturday from Tuesday to Saturday from 1:00 p.m. to 09:00 p.m.
  • Closed on Sunday and Monday
  • Please be present at Gravity Indoor Skydiving 1 hour before their flight time.
Ticket Information:

  • Gravity Indoor Skydiving ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable. 
Important things to know before your visit
 Gravity Indoor Skydiving Dress Code: Upon arrival, customers are kindly requested to wear sneakers and socks.

Age and Health Restrictions:
  • Participants must not have a history of neck, back or heart problems and is not claustrophobic.
  • Participants must not be intoxicated or has taken any medication which is likely to interfere with the ability to flight.
  • The maximum weight limit is 135 kg. 
  • It is recommended that participants be at least 4 years old and weigh at least 15 kg. For individuals under 4 years old or lighter than 15 kg, the parent or guardian assumes full responsibility.
How to get there:
By car: Take Sheikh Khalifa Bin Salman Highway (Highway 55) towards Manama and follow signs to the venue. Plan your journey in advance and allow for potential traffic delays.  

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to Gravity Indoor Skydiving from anywhere in Manama. It's a famous destination and most drivers will be familiar with the location. Indoor Skydiving: Gravity Indoor Skydiving, Manama Get ready to enter the action-packed world of Indoor Skydiving at Gravity Indoor Skydiving, right in the heart of Bahrain.    

Indoor Skydiving is a one-of-a-kind venue that will surely provide you with an amazing indoor skydiving experience. 

There, you'll get to feel the sensation of freefalling through one of the world's largest wind tunnels. You don't have to worry about having experience as it caters to all skill levels, so whether you're a beginner or an experienced flyer, this is one of, if not the best indoor skydiving facility where the daredevil inside you can be let loose.    

With expert instructors and world-class equipment, gravity Indoor Skydiving ensures safety first while still providing the ultimate adventure for all experience levels. This is the perfect opportunity to test your limits and learn the art of human body flight in a safe and controlled environment.

description: .	Join The Black Boats for an unforgettable speed boat tour experience in Dubai. title: Dubai Private City Tour with Transfers
description:
Come and join our tour and you will discover more of the hidden secrets of this town with our friendly English Speaking Tour Guide. We will take you through the heart of Dubai and explore a fascinating morning tour. The most modern and most desired tourist destination, which has lot to surprise any tourist who arrives in Dubai. We will have a start with a Visit to Gold Souk and Spice Souk. From there, you will have a chance to buy a souvenirs from your Love ones. there will be a drive through "Dubai Frame" which is the World's largest frame and then drive towards the Burj Khalifa in Sheikh Zayed Road and proceed to Palm Island and have a photo stop at "The Pointe" where you will have the stunning view of Atlantis The Palm, we will also visit Madinat Souk where you will see the fascinating "Burj Al Arab‚Äùand drive back to hotel.

Highlights
  •  Visit to Gold Souk n Spice Souk by Abra
  •  Visit to Marjan Gallery Drive through Sheikh Zayed Road 
  •  Photostop at Madinat Jumeirah Souk for Burj Al Arab
  •  photo Photostop at the Pointe

Inclusions:  
  • Pick up and drop off with private transfer 
  • 4 hours tour with English speaking chauffeur for half day
  • 8 hours  tour with English speaking chauffeur if you select the full day
  Exclusions:
  • Ticket entry to any attraction
  • Food and drinks
  • Any souvenirs 


Timing: 
Full-day Tour: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. (8 hours)
Half-day Tour: 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. (4 hours)  

Ticket Information:  
  • Children under 3 years can join the tour for free.
  • Dubai City Tour ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable.
  • Visitors are not allowed to bring glassware or alcohol into the premises.
  Important things to know before your visit

How to get there:
For this tour, guests will be provided pick-up and drop-off from their location. Join our tour to uncover the hidden secrets of Dubai with our amiable English-speaking tour guide. Explore the heart of the city during a captivating morning tour, delving into the surprises that Dubai, the most modern and sought-after tourist destination, has to offer.  

Begin with a visit to the Gold Souk and Spice Souk, providing an opportunity to purchase souvenirs for your loved ones. Enjoy a drive through the iconic 'Dubai Frame,' the world's largest frame, followed by a journey along Sheikh Zayed Road towards Burj Khalifa. Continue to Palm Island, with a photo stop at 'The Pointe,' offering a stunning view of Atlantis The Palm. Explore Madinat Souk to witness the captivating Burj Al Arab before concluding the tour with a return to the hotel.

title: Abu Dhabi Private City Tour from Dubai with Transfers
description:

title: Morning Desert Safari Dubai with Dune Bashing, Sand Boarding & Camel Ride
description:
Experience an exhilarating morning desert safari in Dubai, starting with a hotel pick-up in a 4x4 Land Cruiser, followed by a thrilling 35-45 minutes of dune bashing across the Lahbab Red Dunes. Take in the breathtaking desert scenery and feel the adrenaline rush as the Land Cruiser navigates the sandy terrain. Capture unforgettable moments with sandboarding, a popular desert activity, and enjoy optional quad biking. Afterwards, immerse yourself in Arabian hospitality at the Al Khayma camp, where you'll be treated to traditional Arabic coffee, sweets, and dates. Relax and embark on a short camel ride in the nearby area before concluding your adventure and being transported back to your hotel. Discover the best of Dubai's desert landscape with this unforgettable morning safari.

Highlights
  • Enjoy a morning safari in the Dubai Desert
  • Experience the excitement of a dune-bashing adventure in a 4x4 Land Cruiser
  • Try sandboarding, fast becoming one of the most popular desert activities and drive the optional off-road quad bike
  • Immerse yourself in the charm of the Al Khayma traditional camp and embark on an unforgettable camel ride experience.
  What’s included in the ticket
  • Clean, air-conditioned 4x4 Land Cruiser
  • Pickup and drop-off in Dubai
  • Dune bashing (30-45 minutes)
  • Sandboarding and photos stop
  • A professional licensed safari guide
  • A short camel ride (which can be repeated)
  • Cold mineral water
Not included: 
  • Quad bike (optional)
Timing: 

Pickup time - Summer: 7:00 AM | Winter: 7:45AM 
The tour ends at 12:00 p.m.   

Ticket Information: 
  • Morning Desert Safari Dubai Ticket sales are final and are 100% non-refundable. 
Important things to know before your visit
Age and Health Restrictions: 
  • Infants (under the age of 3) are not allowed in the car during the dune-bashing drive
  • This activity is not allowed for pregnant women or those who have back, neck, or heart problems
  • It is recommended that you do not to eat 2 to 3 hours before the safari trip to avoid sickness during the dune bashing
  • Self-practicing quad biking is solely your responsibility. It is strongly recommended that you listen to and follow the tour leader. Please note that any damage, injuries sustained or items lost during quad biking are not covered by insurance
How to get there:
Complimentary pickup is available from Dubai city hotels, apartments, and Cruise terminal Dubai ( Port Rashid).

Pickup from Bab Al Shams, Al Maha Resort, and Jebel Ali is available with an additional fee. On shared tours the actual pick-up time will be within 45 minutes of your selected pickup time, Please be ready at the hotel lobby on time. Experience an exhilarating morning desert safari in Dubai, starting with a hotel pick-up in a 4x4 Land Cruiser, followed by a thrilling 30-45 minutes of dune bashing across the Lahbab Red Dunes.

Take in the breathtaking desert scenery and feel the adrenaline rush as the Land Cruiser navigates the sandy terrain. Capture unforgettable moments with sandboarding, a popular desert activity, and enjoy optional quad biking.

Afterwards, immerse yourself in Arabian hospitality at the Al Khayma camp, where you'll be treated to traditional Arabic coffee, sweets, and dates. Relax and embark on a short camel ride in the nearby area chance to interact with falcons before concluding your adventure and being transported back to your hotel.

Discover the best of Dubai's desert landscape with this unforgettable morning safari.

title: Rising Sun Hot Air Balloon Ride in Ras Al Khaimah
description:
One of the best things to do in Ras Al Khaimah is watching the sun rise and illuminate the spectacular Ras al Khaimah desert from a hot air balloon.

You’ll love the dramatic and spectacular colours of the Northern Emirates, the dunes are contoured as if sculpted by giants from rich reddish gold.   Soar with eagles to a height you may observe wildlife in their natural habitat. You may see foxes, oryx, camels, herds of wild donkeys, and more.  

Each day offers different views, as we launch from various locations depending on the wind conditions on the day. We may fly past mangroves, the desert and wadis towards the majestic Hajar Mountains, or out towards the coast and back where we will see Marjan Island and the Arabian sea.

Spectacular scenery can be assured from each location.   We offer flights for individuals, small personal occasions, large groups of 20 persons per basket. Group rates apply Contact us to arrange private group flights ActionFlight hot air Balloon flights are a premium quality adventure.


Your enjoyment of every aspect of our operation, from safety standards, food and beverage, customer service and attention to detail is our priority.


What is Included:  

  • Soar high above the Ras al Khaimah desert in a hot air balloon and immerse yourself in a breathtaking panoramic view that showcases the mesmerizing expanse of golden dunes stretching as far as the eye can see.
  • Indulge in a captivating hot air balloon ride in Ras al Khaimah that combines the thrill of soaring through the sky with the serene tranquility of floating gently above the desert
  • Experience the thrill of spotting elusive desert wildlife from a unique vantage point as you glide silently through the air.


  Important Information:    

•  Age Restrictions : Only allowed for children above 5 years. We reserve the right to ask for children to be restrained, or to refuse to fly them if safety is a concern.
   Children and teenagers under the age of 16 must always be accompanied by an adult or person 16 years or over, who is responsible for them during the flight.
   Ballooning is also not an activity suitable for babies due to safety reasons.
•  The maximum permissible weight is 130 kg.  
• DSLR or Camera is not allowed. You can use your mobile phones to capture photos (on flight/airplane mode)
• Ballooning is a weather dependant activity. We won’t fly in rain, fog, or wind consistently above 11 kph. We won’t take a balloon up if there is a threat of thunderstorms in the area.
• If your flight is cancelled, you can re book at a convenient time, within the valid period of your booking or voucher. 



  How to get there:

•  Return transport is available at the rate of 100 AED per passenger originating from Dubai, Fujairah, Sharjah, Ajman or Umm Al Quwain to Ras Al Khaimah
•  Passengers from Dubai and beyond are welcome to drive and park in Ras Al Khaimah. Transport within Ras Al Khaimah is free. 
•  Pick up time and place is arranged upon booking.

Witness the mesmerizing sunrise and be enchanted by the breathtaking Ras al Khaimah desert from a hot air balloon, offering a unique and exhilarating experience in one of the most captivating destinations. Enjoy the vibrant colors and contours of the dunes, encounter wildlife in their natural habitat, and soak in the stunning views of mangroves, mountains, and coastal beauty. ActionFlight ensures a premium adventure with a strong emphasis on safety, exceptional service, and meticulous attention to detail, making it an unforgettable journey for both individuals and groups.

title: Dubai Marina Sunset Cruise with Live Music & Open Bar
description:
Elevate your evening to new heights with Dubai's exclusive 4-star luxury boat cruise, providing a truly remarkable experience. Step aboard our magnificent 125ft glass houseboat and embark on a journey of indulgence. Our exceptional service ensures an unforgettable dinner cruise, where you can relish the opulence of your private seating while savoring the exquisite flavors of our sumptuous international buffet menu, crafted by The Radisson Blu Hotel.   • Photo Moments

title: Thrilling Off-Road Adventure: Quad Bike
description:

Whether you prefer the inside area camp or the vastness of the outside open desert, the thrill is guaranteed. Unleash your inner thrill-seeker, embrace the extraordinary, and make memories that last a lifetime with our Quad Bike tours in Dubai!



Highlights

  • Diverse Quad Adventures: Embark on a thrilling quad bike adventure in Dubai, where you can choose between navigating challenging terrains in the open desert or enjoying the excitement within our dedicated camp area.
  • Scenic Variety: Explore the breathtaking landscapes of Dubai, whether it's the vast golden sand dunes stretching across the open desert or the curated surroundings of our camp area. Each location offers unique and stunning views.
  • Dual Experiences: Opt for the exhilarating open desert experience, conquering steep dunes, or enjoy the convenience and structured fun of quad biking within our camp area. The choice is yours for a tailored adventure.
  • Expert Guidance in Two Settings: Our experienced guides are there to ensure your safety and provide insights into the desert ecosystem, history, and culture, enriching your experience whether you're in the open desert or within the camp area.
  • Inclusive for All: Whether you're a beginner or an experienced off-roader, both the open desert and camp area tours cater to all skill levels. Expert instructors offer orientations, making it an inclusive adventure for everyone.
  • Lasting Memories: Capture unforgettable moments, whether it's the thrill of conquering open desert dunes or the camaraderie within the camp area. Immortalize your adventure with stunning photographs of both unique settings in the Dubai desert.
 

What’s included in the ticket

title: The Lost Paradise of Dilmun Water Park
description:
Looking for a weekend getaway that combines fun, excitement, and adventure? Look no further than the Lost Paradise of Dilmun, the largest water park in Bahrain! With over 20 different slides, rafters, and pools, there's something for everyone at Lost Paradise of Dilmun. Whether you're looking for a relaxing day in the sun or a thrilling adrenaline rush, you're sure to have a blast at this amazing water park.

Games in Lost Paradise of Dilmun:
  • Boomerango: Feel the adrenaline rush as you defy gravity on this giant pendulum-style slide.
  • Body slides: Travel at high speed through three winding flumes in the dark.
  • Family raft ride: Spin and speed down the long, winding chute with your family and friends.
  • The paradise river: Float gently through the caves on the lazy river.
  • Spa pool: Relax your muscles in the therapeutic spa pool or Jacuzzi.
  • Speed slide: Plunge down the vertical sheet of water and experience the thrill of free-falling.
  • Aqua loop rocket slide: Experience the most exciting free-fall drop on the world's fastest looping rocket slide.
  • Oasis pool: Take a break from the action and relax at the Oasis pool.
  • Super Bowl: Twist and shout as you spin around and round the bowl.

Highlights
  • A special weekend getaway filled with fun, excitement, and adventure.
  • Enjoy over 20 thrilling slides, rafters, and pools catering to all ages and preferences.
  • Experience heart-pounding attractions like the Boomerango, Aqua Loop Rocket Slide, and Super Bowl, alongside relaxing options like the lazy river and spa pool.

What’s included in the ticket: 
Access to all the park's activities and rides.     

Timing: 
  • 8th march to 10th march - 10am to 7pm
Ramadan timing
  • Sunday to Thursday - 5pm to 1am
  • Friday / Saturday - 12noon to 1am

Important things to know before your visit
  • The Lost Paradise of Dilmun Water Park Dress Code: Kids must wear personal floatation devices at all times.
  • Guests enter the water park at their own risk.
  • The owners and/or management are not responsible for any lost/stolen property, body injury or accidents.
How to get there:
By car: Take the King Faisal Highway (Highway 5) west of Manama and continue until you reach the exit for Zallaq.
Follow the signs for the water park. The water park will be on your right-hand side."

By taxi: You can also take a taxi to The Lost Paradise of Dilmun Water Park from anywhere in Bahrain. It's a famous destination and most drivers will be familiar with the location. title: Premium Red Dunes Safari with Camel Ride & 3 Cuisines at Al Khayma Camp
description:
About Premium Red Dunes Safari & Camel Ride & 3 Cuisines at Al Khayma Camp Dubai: Adventure Quad Bike safari, Camel Ride, Sandboarding and BBQ


Overview

Traverse to the alluring Lahbab Desert and engage in thrilling adventures. Experience the thrill of quad biking, sandboarding and enjoy a peaceful camel ride. Retreat to the Bedouin camp and experience cultural activities and delicious dinner/lunch.

 

Highlights

  • Enjoy an evening at the exclusive Al Khayma Desert Camp, Dubai in the middle of the desert.
  • Bash dunes for 30-45-minutes in the Lehbab desert.
  • 3-Cuisine Traditional Dinner: Relish a 3-cuisine Emirati, Moroccan, & Arabian dinner catered by Al Khayma Heritage Restaurant.
  • Smoke a shisha pipe, henna painting, Arabian makeover with a falcon
  • Ride on a camel caravan.
  • Traverse the tall red dunes of the Lahbab desert by Dune Bashing and Sandboarding.
  • Choose the option to ride qua bikes through the desert.
  • Watch the tanoura and belly dance show (no show during the month of Ramadan).
  • Al Khayma Camp:Spend time in the serene atmosphere of the Al Khayma Camp 
  • Stargazing Session: Treat your eyes to the beauty of the desert sky on a stargazing session with a high-power telescope.


Full Description

Ride to the Desert

Excited about a heart-pounding desert adventure? Level up your fun in Dubai by setting out on an exciting desert safari through the desert's golden sands. Get a comfortable transfer on an Air-conditioned 4WD vehicle.

Dune Bashing and Sandboarding

At the desert, experience the real adventure as you tackle the sloping sands of the desert by dune bashing if the Red Dune Safari is selected. Worry not! You’ll be completely safe while enjoying it, under our guidance. Just after you recover from the excitement of dune bashing, you’ll get a chance to conquer the steepest slopes like a warrior by sandboarding. 

Al Khayma Heritage Camp & Bedouin Entertainment

The fun doesn’t end here. As the sun turns the countryside an amazing shade of crimson orange, Al Khayma Heritage Camp will be all set to welcome you. From there, reward yourself with feeding the camels and riding them to explore nature like a Bedouin local.Then comes your chance to be immersed in the Bedouin entertainment activities! Tick off your entertainment list as you indulge in the camp activities such as Live Arabic Coffee & tea station, Bedouin & Arabian entertainment with a fire show, Henna, Shisha Station, and more. 

Traditional Dinner & Stargazing

 A 3-course dinner with Emirati, Moroccan, & Arabian dishes catered by Al Khayma Restaurant is all that you need to feast your palate. The delicious dinner, catered by the Michelin BiB-rated restaurant, is sure to remind you of the good times in the camp later. 

Once your heart and tummy are full, observe the millions of stars with an enchanting stargazing session with a high-power telescope to enlighten your evening before wrapping up the day.

After all the adventurous activities and a wholesome meal, you will be dropped back to your hotel or selected location in Dubai.

 

Includes

  • Pick-up and drop off at your selected hotel/ location
  • Transportation by 4WD air-conditioned vehicle
  • Licensed desert safari guide
  • Dune bashing (30-40 minutes)
  • Sandboarding, Camel ride & Camel feeding
  • Al Khayma Premium Camp visit
  • Gaymat (sweets), Gahwa (coffee), and dates
  • Henna Tatoo, Falcon experience & Shisha in the Shisha Area
  • Unlimited Water & Soft drinks
  • Sunset photo stop
  • Arabian entertainment " Tanura, Fire shows & Khaliji Dance "
  • Stunning sunset views
  • Live BBQ
  • Open buffets Dinner "Emirati, Moroccan & Arabian Buffet “ vegetarian & non-vegetarian options” catered by Al Khayma Heritage Restaurant.
  • Stargazing session;High-power telescope
  • Natural trees and fountains

 

What’s Not Included

  • Alcoholic beverages
  • Quad bike/Dune buggy activities (optional)
  • Tipping (not mandatory)
  • Any extra services or expenses not mentioned above.

 

Important Note:

  • There will be no khaliji dance shows during Ramadan
  • The tour is shared which means sharing a vehicle with other participants.
  • The tour is not allowed for pregnant ladies, people with heart and back issues and kids younger than 3 years old. 

 

Know Before You Go

  • The duration of this activity is approximately 6 hours.
  • To take part in quad biking, the participants must be 16 years or above and should have a basic driving knowledge. Anyone under 16 years should be accompanied by an adult.
  • Children under the age of 10 are not allowed to participate in this tour.
  • Pregnant women and anyone with back or neck pain, heart problems or other serious medical complaints are not allowed to participate.
  • The quad biking segment is solely the participant's responsibility. Listening to and following the instructor is strongly recommended. Any damage, injuries sustained or items lost during the quad bike tour shall not be covered by insurance.
  • Please wear sports shoes for safe sandboarding
  • Please note that if your skin is sensitive to henna, it is advised not to do it.
  • During the month of holy Ramadan, Belly Dance Khaliji will not be performed at the camp as per UAE law. On other Islamic holidays (announced by the govt prior to the specific event/day) there will not be any entertainment activities in the camp as it is strictly not permitted by UAE law
  • All participants must sign an indemnity form before the tour.
  • It is not recommended to carry expensive items. Your belongings are your own responsibility and we are not responsible for any lost belongings during the trip. We will, of course, do our best to help you out if an item is lost.
  • This tour is not wheelchair accessible.
  • We don't accepts no responsibility for any damage, loss, accident, sickness, injury or death that you or anyone else may suffer or incur arising out of the activities and/or in connection with your contract with us and/or the operator of any activities. You are advised to have comprehensive travel and health insurance. All personal effects are at your sole risk at all times during the activity. You understand and accept the potential risks and hazards that can be involved in certain activities. You take responsibility for ensuring that you are mentally and physically capable of participating in a particular activity.


Pickup Location

 Complimentary pick up may be done from any Dubai hotels and other accommodations as well as Cruise terminal Dubai (Port Rashid).
Pick up from Dubai airport is possible from Holiday Inn Airport hotel.
You also may have a pick up from Bab Al Shams, Al Maha resort, and Jebel Ali at extra charge.
Due to heavy traffic in the Rove Marina and Wyndham Dubai Marina areas, Stella Di Mare Hotel will be the meeting point.
Pick up may be done within 45 minutes of appointed departure time.
Please be in a hotel lobby on time.
Please leave us your Whatsapp number for smooth communication during the pick up.


Tickets 
Premium Evening Red Dunes Desert Safari with BBQ at Al Khayma Camp ticket price includes all entertainments mentioned above, a shared transfer, and a BBQ. Tickets for kids from 3 to 11 years come with a discount. Traverse to the alluring Lahbab Desert and engage in thrilling adventures. Experience the thrill of quad biking, sandboarding, and enjoy a peaceful camel ride. Retreat to the Bedouin camp and experience cultural activities and a delicious lunch/dinner. Enjoy an evening at the exclusive Al Khayma Desert Camp, Dubai, in the heart of the desert.  

Go dune bashing for 30-45 minutes in the Lehbab desert and indulge in a 3-Cuisine Traditional Dinner, relishing Emirati, Moroccan, and Arabian delicacies catered by Al Khayma Heritage Restaurant. Smoke a shisha pipe, enjoy henna painting, and experience an Arabian makeover with a falcon. Ride on a camel caravan and traverse the tall red dunes of the Lahbab desert by dune bashing and sandboarding. You can also choose the option to ride quad bikes through the desert.  

Watch the captivating tanoura and belly dance shows (note: no show during the month of Ramadan). Spend time in the serene atmosphere of the Al Khayma Camp, and treat your eyes to the beauty of the desert sky during a stargazing session with a high-power telescope.  

This is an adventure like no other—full of excitement, culture, and beauty!

title: History & Heritage Tour of Qatar
description:
Get the chance to explore Qatar's heritage by heading north to visit historical sites like Al Zubarah Fort and Al Ruwais. The tour also passes by Al Khor, known for its harbor and beaches. Highlights include Al Zubarah Fort's sand-colored architecture, the remains of Al Jumail Abandoned Village, and learning about Al Khor's fishing-based history. This tour offers a glimpse into Qatar's past and its early sources of income. Key Sights Al Zubarah Fort, Al Jumail Abandoned Village, and the town of Al Khor.

Highlights
  • Al Zubarah Fort: A solitary, sand-colored stronghold with four towers, standing guard in the desert.
  • Al Jumail Abandoned Village: Encounter remnants of an ancient traditional settlement along the way.
  • Al Khor's Historical Mainstay: Discover Qatar's early economy in Al Khor, rooted in fishing traditions.

title: Muscat Night Tour with Local Dinner
description:
Embark from your hotel for a captivating night tour of Muscat. Departing from Shatti Al-Qurum (next to Intercontinental Hotel), this condensed city tour offers a unique nocturnal perspective. Our journey begins with a glimpse of the Royal Opera, a grand monument commissioned by the music-loving Sultan. Capture the beauty of the illuminated Mohammed Al Ameen Mosque during a photo stop. As we progress, venture to the historic Old Muscat and its picturesque Corniche, taking in the enchanting harbor views. Our next stop is the vibrant Muttrah Souq, where you'll encounter a delightful mix of old and new, immersed in the sights, sounds, and fragrances of daily life. Take a moment for some souvenir shopping. Continue our night expedition with a visit to the prominent Al Alam Palace, capturing the gates and colonnaded approach in the stunning night ambiance. The palace, flanked by the 16th-century Portuguese forts of Jalali and Mirani, serves ceremonial purposes and boasts breathtaking illuminations. Returning to our starting point, pass by the renowned Al Bustan Hotel, Wadi Al Kabir, and Ruwi downtown. Finally, conclude the evening at our last destination, savoring a delightful Omani fish grilled to perfection in the company of locals. After this memorable experience, we'll transfer you back to your hotel.

Highlights
  • Night city tour from Shatti Al-Qurum, with hotel pick-up
  • Pass by Royal Opera, commissioned by the SULTAN
  • Photo stop at illuminated Mohammed Al Ameen Mosque
  • Explore Old Muscat and its Corniche, enjoy harbor views
  • Visit Muttrah Souq for shopping and local experience
  • Drive to Al Alam Palace for illuminated gates and colonial approach
  • Admire nearby Portuguese forts
  • Witness stunning lighting effects
  • Return passing Al Bustan hotel, Wadi Al Kabir, Ruwi downtown
  • Enjoy grilled Omani fish among locals
  • Transfer back to hotel for a memorable Muscat night experience.
What’s included in the ticket
  • Pick-up and drop-off at appointed hotels or locations on private vehicles.
  • Professional and experienced tour guides.
  • Dinner and Soft Drinks.
  • Photostop at Al Alam Palace & Mohammed Al Ameen Mosque.
Exclusions
  • Any other expenses not mentioned in the inclusions
Timing: 
  • The duration of the tour is 4 to 5 hours, depending on traffic conditions
  • The tour is available only on Sunday, Tuesday, Thursday & Friday.

Important things to know before your visit
  • Dress code: Appropriate clothing is required for the tour.
Age and Health Restrictions:
  • Muscat Night Tour with Local Dinner, Visit is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers.

title: Full Day Nizwa Tour With Local Lunch
description:
Experience a Full-Day Nizwa Tour with Local Lunch, starting from Shatti Al-Qurum, near the Intercontinental Hotel. Discover Oman's rich heritage of forts and castles, which have served as historical defense points. We'll explore a selection of these architectural marvels, departing at 9 a.m. for Nizwa, Oman's cultural hub. Our journey begins with a visit to the enchanting ancestral village of Birkat Al Mawz nestled at the base of the verdant Jebel Akhdar. Then, we'll head to the heart of Nizwa to glimpse its impressive Fort and iconic circular cannon Tower, strolling through the traditional Nizwa Souq. Enjoy a local restaurant lunch before we continue to the remarkable Jabreen Fort, a 17th-century masterpiece known for its exquisite plasterwork, intricately carved doors, and painted wooden ceiling beams. Following our visit to Jabreen Castle, we'll embark on a scenic drive toward Jebel Shams, one of Oman's renowned mountains. En route, we'll pass through Bahla, one of Oman's oldest small towns, featuring its own fort. Our journey concludes in Nizwa's downtown, and we'll smoothly return to Muscat after an enriching day. The tour concludes at Avenue Mall, and we'll provide a convenient transfer back to your hotel.

Highlights
  • Begin at Shatti Al-Qurum near the Intercontinental Hotel for a cultural tour of Oman's forts and castles.
  • Explore Nizwa, the cultural capital, and its impressive Fort and Cannon Tower.
  • Visit Birkat Al Mawz village at the base of Jebel Akhdar.
  • Discover Jabreen Fort, renowned for its stunning plasterwork and design.
  • Journey to Jebel Shams, a famous Omani mountain, passing Bahla town and its fort.
  • End the day at Muscat's Avenue Mall before returning to your hotel.
What’s included in the ticket
  • Pick-up and drop-off at appointed hotels or locations on a Sharing basis.
  • Professional and experienced tour guides.
  • Entrance fees to Jabreen Fort.
  • Photostop at Bahla Fort.

title: Half Day Muscat City Tour
description:
Being a rare blend of ancient & modern, Muscat is a beautiful city which lies in a maze of brown pleated Mountains. Lulled by the Arabian Sea, the city has undergone dramatic development in the past two or three decades. However, Muscat takes pride in the fact that it has preserved its lustrous culture & heritage.

What To Expect

Enjoy a Half Day Muscat City Tour, we will pick you up from your hotel. The tour will start from Shatti Al-Qurum (next to Intercontinental Hotel) . 

Our visit starts with a drive through the ministries' area, where you can see a number of modern buildings with touches of ancient, Islamic architecture.

Our first stop will be the Grand Mosque, which is an architectural marvel and perhaps the new landmark of the city.

We will then visit the fish market and the folkloric Muttrah souk, with its narrow-covered alleys where you can smell exotic aromas of mounds of spices, coffee beans, and ancient remedies, all enticing perfumes that fill the air. Next, engage in a visit to the Bait Al Zubair Museum, which has a fine exhibit of Omani history and culture, encompassing all of the area’s traditional values.

You will also have a photo-stop at the magnificent Al Alam Palace (the official residence of Sultan Qaboos) flanked by the twin Portuguese forts of Mirani & Jalali. Tour will end in Mutrah souk & then transfer back to your hotel

Highlights

  • Explore Muscat's captivating blend of ancient and modern, nestled amidst brown mountains and kissed by the Arabian Sea.
  • Begin with a drive through the ministries' area, where modern and Islamic architecture harmoniously coexist.
  • Be awed by the Grand Mosque, a striking modern landmark.
  • Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of the fish market and Muttrah souk, where exotic scents and age-old remedies fill the air.
  • Delve into Omani history and culture at the Bait Al Zubair Museum, a repository of tradition.
  • Capture a memorable photo at Al Alam Palace, the official residence of Sultan Qaboos, flanked by historic Portuguese forts.
  • Conclude your journey in the bustling Mutrah souk before returning to your hotel.
What’s included in the ticket
  • Pick-up and drop-off at appointed hotels or locations on sharing basis.
  • Professional and experienced tour guides.
  • Entrance fees to Bait Al Zubair.
  • Photostop at Al Alam Palace.
  • Visit to Grand Mosque.
What’s not included in the ticket
  • Any other expenses not mentioned in Incusions
Timing: 
  • The duration of the tour is 4 to 5 hours, depending on traffic conditions 
  • The tour operates daily, except on Fridays.
Important things to know before your visit

- Dress code: Appropriate clothing is required for the tour.
- Age and Health Restrictions:
- Half Day Muscat City TourVisit is suitable for people of all ages, including expecting mothers. Join us for an unforgettable Muscat Half Day Tour, starting with a convenient pick-up from your hotel. The journey begins at Shatti Al-Qurum, near the Intercontinental Hotel, where we'll drive through the ministries' area. Here, you can admire modern buildings adorned with ancient Islamic architectural touches.   Our first stop is the Grand Mosque, an architectural marvel and a new city landmark. Next, we'll visit the bustling fish market and the folkloric Muttrah Souk. Wander through its narrow, covered alleys and inhale the exotic aromas of spices, coffee beans, and ancient remedies that fill the air.  

Our tour continues with a visit to the Bait Al Zubair Museum, showcasing a rich exhibit of Omani history and culture, reflecting the area’s traditional values. We'll also make a photo stop at the magnificent Al Alam Palace, the official residence of Sultan Qaboos, flanked by the historic Portuguese forts of Mirani and Jalali.   The half-day Muscat City Tour concludes in Muttrah Souk, where you'll have time to explore before we transfer you back to your hotel. Join us for a journey through time in the beautiful city of Muscat, where every corner tells a story.
